knimeNode.name: CSV Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Saves a datatable into a file in csv (comma separated value) format.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes out the datatable, entering via its input port, into a file. The attribute values are separated by commas. In the configuration dialog of the node, enter a valid destination filename and set a checkmark if you want the column headers to be written out (in the first line) and each line to be preceeded by the row ID. It is also possible to specify a pattern that can be written out when an attribute value is missing.
